message.body: ￼I bought you this beautiful sand time keeper but it broke. I am very upset. There will be nothing waiting for you when you get back.
Sweetie! How lovely and sad. It's the thought and beauty that counts. I appreciate that!!!
But it's a good story, like how you cried over the broken bracelet. And I will see my painting at the show! Cool!
I am very upset. Your painting has to stay at the show until we take it down next week
Yes yes
Ok
Are you awake?
Wendy I love you so much!!!
Yes and at cafe working!
Ok call me
Oh ok i have a question
Sorry but we must skip seeing each other tonite. My train gets in approx 8 and I will want to just go to sleep! So just leave the key on the table and shut door behind you ok?
Hey I'll be there around 7 40? Is that still ok?
Fine!
Thanks Wendy!
Woohoo! I can see my bdlg from the train, way off in the distance !
And listening to I Feel good James brown!
Yeah!!!
So happy to have your vibes!
It is perfect here my darling. It is so good to come home to this, to your note and your sand and your care. It makes me so happy that you were happy here.
Home and it is perfect!!! Yay Sofie!
Hey sof I cannot find the little basket for the Nesspresso machine...
Basket??? Hmmm
What did it look like
Was it inside the machine?
￼It goes inside here, shaped like the black part, and catches the capsules
No, what?
Oh no. I don't know. You know what that means?

It is probably gone. I never saw it. Which means I didn't clean it and put it somewhere. Oh no Wendy I'm sorry I must have tossed it the one time I emptied it. I'm so sorry. Tomorrow we will figure out a solution. I will find a replacement online
Oh I get it. Yeah good idea to look online. Thnx!
I'm sorry please don't be mad
Sweetie of course I am not mad! This is so fixable! You already told me your planned solution, which is fine!

Solution 20 My husband threw ours away. So I inquired next time I ordered pods, and you can buy one online when you order. Just put it in the comments box on your order form (although it may be better to call and order it, as the first time I tried this they missed it). Anyway. It was like $3.50. Then my husband threw that one away too, so I gave up. ;) juboon on Jul 30, 2009
Just saw this online
When you get a chance will you send me the model number/name? I'll call the company. They should send it for free. I am so sorry
Gnite darling!
